contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy Enemy Structures and Extract Safely
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Liao Facility and Extract Safely

dialogueContent.words: Commander, the comms facility is just on the other side of that hill, straight ahead.
They're completely unaware for now, but once you make contact with the facility's defenses, you should expect reinforcements.
The facility's transmission capabilities are neutralized, Commander. Well doâ€”
Force Commander Singh, pardon the interruption. We've just accessed the Liao facility's comms, and there's an inbound convoy requesting to speak with the base commander. What should we tell them?
Nothing ever goes completely right in covert ops, does it? Lieutenant, stall them. We'll scramble an interception before they can report in.
Commander, I require your assistance to covertly eliminate this convoy. Please assemble a light, low-tonnage lance for immediate deployment. I'll brief on your way to the area of operation.
Commander, we need to abort the operation; they managed to get a signal out to their headquarters, reporting our presence here.
Commander, I'm seeing another lance closing on the facility. Be ready for a possible ambush.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

longDescription: We're assaulting a fortified base with an underweight lance, Commander. Sort of feels like old times, doesn't it?

objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Liao Communications Facility

objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the garrison / defenders of the base.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Liao Defenders
Hidden Objective: Destroy the Base Turrets

objectiveList.description: The objective to eliminate enemy reinforcements who attack.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Liao Reinforcements

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to extract their units.
objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone

shortDescription: The communications facility has not been alerted to our presence, as we'd hoped, Commander. That means we will be able to land your team unnoticed and disable the facility. The defenses will be light; it has one lance as a garrison and one lance as a patrol element, plus fixed gun emplacements. However, I'd still recommend caution, given the limited force strength we were able to drop and still remain covert. As mentioned, the covert approach means we have limited intel about the base itself, so you'll be operating somewhat blind at first.
